message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal.
I understand you wanting a larger share Alice, but time is working against me more than you.  Let's be reasonable and split the difference from your offer - we both benefit that way.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a reasonable offer considering the time pressure.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you more than half the value if you factor in inflation! This is my final offer.
